scripts.build: webpack --progress --colors lib/index.js dist/markdown-more-filters.js && webpack --progress --colors lib/markdown.js dist/markdown-more.js && webpack -p --progress --colors lib/index.js dist/markdown-more-filters.min.js && webpack -p --progress --colors lib/markdown.js dist/markdown-more.min.js
scripts.pages: git subtree push --prefix example/public origin gh-pages
